description: The main protagonist of the story, he is often seen as a delinquent because of his red eyes and rough exterior (accented by a scar on his left eyebrow). In truth, he has a caring personality. Because of everyone`s less-than-friendly perceptions, he is often accused of performing perverted acts on the girls of the academy. His childhood friend Tomomi is often behind the schemes leading to these misunderstandings.
name: Hino Akiharu
